meanings: 입원에 관한 표현 Please use a treatment covered by insurance.

meanings.meaning: I (will) leave it[that] to you, sir.
Be so good as to do

vlive.korean: 한마디 해 주십시오 - 독고빈 아니에요? Please say something. - Isn't he Dok Gobin? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: Please say something. - Isn't he Dok Gobin?

vlive.korean: 해석 좀 해주십시오 무슨 말인지... Please translate. We didn't understand a word. 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]해성국제컨벤션고등학교 ep.1
vlive.english: Please translate. We didn't understand a word.

vlive.korean: 본방 사수 해주십시오 - 본방 사수 어디서 나와요? Don't miss it. - Where could we watch it? 듣기 View video X1 : D-DAY
vlive.english: Don't miss it. - Where could we watch it?

vlive.korean: 대답을 좀 해주십시오. Please answer me. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [LEE JUNG JAE] 지옥에서 온 염디(?)를 신고합니다❗️ (JungJae Lee calling with director Kim)
아주 냉정한 판단을 해주십시오. Please judge it objectively. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 새롬이와 여르미의 [LOVE BOMB] MV Reaction

examples.korean: Please acquaint me with the facts of the case. 발음듣기 제가 그 사건과 관련된 사실들을 숙지할 수 있게 해 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please acquaint me with the facts of the case. 발음

examples.korean: Sign your name here, please. 발음듣기 여기에 서명을 해 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sign your name here, please. 발음

examples.korean: Please pay for goods on delivery. 발음듣기 대금 지불은 물품 인도 시 해 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please pay for goods on delivery. 발음

examples.korean: Permit me to offer you some advice. 발음듣기 (제가) 몇 마디 충고의 말씀을 드리도록 해 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Permit me to offer you some advice. 발음

examples.korean: Please give us advance warning of any changes. 발음듣기 어떤 변경이 있을 시엔 저희에게 사전 통고를 해 주십시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please give us advance warning of any changes. 발음
